views.markdown:
Restored Activator support Added LINE icon


Phone call bug fix.


Added iOS 11 support.
Temporary removed Activator actions, until it's updated to support iOS 11.
Added an option to display Chinese and Cyrillic letters in notification preview/caller id: Settings->Notification And Alarm->Transform to Latin->Disable.
Bugfixes.
Fixed connection issue (for some users) caused by the recent MiBand2 firmware update.

Package dependency fixes.

Bug fixes.

Added iOS 10 support
Added VoIP calls support
- on FaceTime/Viber/Whatsapp calls band will show caller ID just as for the regular phone call
- answering/rejecting calls with the button is also supported
Unfortunately snoozing/dismissing alarms with the button doesn't work on iOS 10 yet
- Fixed some connectivity issues.

- Added CallerID and Notification Preview


Bugfix

Updated notification configuration:
- Now it's more convinient to configure notification alerts
Updated Remote Control:
- Removed music controls
- Added Activator actions for Single, Double & Triple button press
- Configurable time to detect number of button presses
Added new connection mode:
- Always except when system DND is active
Added vibration patterns:
- 8 differnet vibration patterns
- Possible to repeat vibration pattern 1-10 times
Added new MiBand icons
- Skype, Viber, Instagram, Messenger ...
Bugfixes
- Fixed Alarm icon (not Phone icon anymore)
- Fixed crash related to missing MiFit application
- No more need to respring after MiFit update
- Fixed a small stopwatch bug
Added stopwatch feature.
Added flipswitch for continuous HR measurement.
Bugfixes.
Added iOS8 support.
